channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Water is coming up from underground in the road and has been for more than a year, 13th August
item.description:
This leak from underground has been there for over a year and this could be doing serious damage and could cause a sinkhole. This needs to be sorted out as soon as possible before more damage is done.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Jasmine Grove, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lethal Cycle and Zebra Crossing on Southgate Rd/Northgate Road Jnt., 13th August
item.description:
The design of that cycling route is utterly dangerous in the least and damn right lethal at worst. Cyclists come at full speed down Northchurch Road without slowing down to cross Southgate Road. Not only that drivers of cars have a big enough problem.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southgate Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bus stop / tree on Salusbury road, 13th August
item.description:

item.title: Tennis Court Signage Missing, 13th August
item.description:
Hello, there is no signage on the tennis courts to confirm which tennis court is numbered. One can book Tennis Court 1, Tennis Court 2 and Tennis Court 3 on the app but there is no signs on the courts indicating which court is which.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ethelbert Road, Plaistow, London

item.title: Outside Nos 21/23, 13th August
item.description:
The road was re-surfaced yesterday (12.08.25) by planning off the existing finish and applying new surface. A cold water mains appears to have been damaged as a result and water is now rising up through the newly laid road surface.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingdon Road, West Hampstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
